Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

yesterday i EVAd around a bit and accidently pressed "2". My little Jeb got something like a red laserbeam from one of the helmet lights....

Can anybody tell me what this does.... and how do i switch it off again?

Greets

WAyan
Did you installed the Lazor System mod?
Whatever you do, don't point it at your rocket... like I did.

It is indeed from the Lazor system mod, something I haven't used in a while. It pretty much acts as a distance measuring device, useful if you're on moons, or, if you're really hardcore, doing your own cartography of planets and moons.
